trans:
2. Transferring the winning ticket for the fan signing event is strictly prohibited.
3. If you are caught using someone else's name to participate in the fan signing event, you will be escorted out immediately.
4. If you enter after consuming alcohol, you may be subject to entry restrictions.
5. We prohibit live streaming on social media platforms (Instagram Live, Facebook Live, YouTube Live, etc.) at fan signing events.
6. Seat changes are not allowed once you've entered. Do not change seats without permission, switch seats during the fan signing, or move around recklessly.
7. Seat exchanges with other attendees are not allowed. You cannot move to a different seat than your assigned one or set up a tripod in any other location.
8. Filming and audio recording are strictly prohibited while waiting in the sign line or during the signing. You will be escorted out if caught.
9. Please be aware that if you receive an autograph while using a mobile phone, Bluetooth earphones, or a smartwatch capable of filming or recording, the on-site staff will conduct a check. If you are found filming or recording, your access will be revoked, and you will be escorted out.
10. Autographs will only be given to the winner of the ZEROBASEONE The 4th Mini Album [ğ‚ğˆğğ„ğŒğ€ ğğ€ğ‘ğ€ğƒğˆğ’ğ„] album. You will not be allowed to request an autograph for anything other than the album or change the name on the album. (If you are caught with photo cards, phone cases, personal belongings, etc., they will not be collected or returned.)
11. Contacting the artist or making unreasonable requests, personal questions, or inquiries that may lead to misunderstandings is not allowed.
12. Please understand that doodles, stickers, and direct hand contact with the skin are not permitted.
